_header: With heart and voice / let us rejoice
Subjects: Mystery plays, English songs in; songs, spiritual
_description: Song at the end of the Norwich Grocers’ Play (1177) — in quatrains

NorfRO21f.Transcription:
With hart & voycelet us reioyce& prayse the Lord
                    alwayefor this our Ioyffull dayeto se of this our god his
                    majestiewho he hath given himselffeouer us to raygne& gouerne
                    usLett all our harte reioyce togetherand let us all lifte up our voyce
                    on of us with another
NorfRO21f.Attributed Title: Old Musick Triplex Tenor Medius Bass (f. 5v)
